title: Boutique Lakefront Escape in Rotorua
description: Fresh lakeside air and romance abound at the stunning Black Swan Lakeside Boutique Hotel, located on the shores of Lake Rotorua, just ten minutes from the city. Take a relaxing short break in a natural paradise and indulge in sumptuous daily breakfasts, a bottle of sparkling accompanied by a fresh fruit plate on arrival, and a NZ$150 credit to be used towards your choice of spa treatments or dining experiences. Enjoy every minute of your getaway with a guaranteed checkout until 12pm.
location_description: Black Swan Lakeside Boutique Hotel - JULY 2018
offer_address: 171 Kawaha Point Rd, Kawaha Point, Rotorua 3010, New Zealand

title: Gourmet Escape in Ancient Rotorua Forest
description: Indulge in a blissful luxury lodge escape amidst 2,500 acres of ancient forest at the award-winning Treetops Lodge & Estate in Rotorua, New Zealand. Relax, unwind, dine on gourmet cuisine crafted using fresh ingredients from the kitchen garden and immerse yourself in the beauty of the estate with walking, biking, horse-riding and more. Your escape includes daily a la carte breakfast cooked to order, nightly pre-dinner drinks followed by gourmet five-course dining, a bottle of wine and a cheese platter on arrival and convenient late checkout.

vendor_name: On the Point - Lake Rotorua (Previously Peppers)
title: Lakeside Bliss in New Zealand’s Rotorua
description: Leave it all behind for fresh lakeside air and breathtaking views. Check in and chill out at Peppers on the Point, a historic lodge nestled in an idyllic spot at the edge of New Zealand's beautiful Lake Rotorua, just ten minutes from the city. Enjoy a relaxing short break with daily breakfasts, an indulgent four-course gourmet dinner, a 30-minute massage each and complimentary wine and chocolates.
offer_address: 214 Kawaha Point Rd, Kawaha Point, Rotorua 3010, New Zealand

title: Grand Opening: Discover Rotorua’s Newest Five-Star Hotel with Executive Lounge Access
description:
Discover the charms of Rotorua from a glamorous, newly-opened launchpad: Pullman Rotorua. Located in one of the most enviable locations in the city, moments from the lakefront, this brand-new oasis - the first five-star hotel in the city - is the perfect base to explore all that the region has to offer, from the biggest geyser in the southern hemisphere to bubbling mud and hot springs.

Your escape includes access to the Executive Lounge with daily breakfast, evening drinks accompanied by canapés, valet parking during your stay, 20% discount on dining at the hotel’s restaurant and a leisurely late 1pm check-out.

vendor_name: On the Point - Lake Rotorua (Previously Peppers)
title: Peppers Rotorua Lakefront Lodge with Four-Course Dinner & Daily Breakfast
description:
Leave it all behind for fresh lakeside air and breathtaking views with an exquisite escape at Peppers on the Point Lake Rotorua - a historic lodge nestled in an idyllic spot at the edge of striking Lake Rotorua on New Zealand's North Island. Set in a former 1930s mansion, this charming property is one of the finest lodges in the area, offering award-winning cuisine, spectacular views and quintessential Peppers luxury in one of New Zealand's most beautiful regions.

Enjoy an unforgettable gourmet escape for two with daily à la carte breakfast, a fine-dining four-course meal, a bottle of wine on arrival, and a box of chocolates.

vendor_name: On the Point - Lake Rotorua (Previously Peppers)
title: Romantic Peppers Rotorua Lakefront Escape with Three-Course Dinner & Daily Breakfast
description:
Leave it all behind for fresh lakeside air and breathtaking views with an exquisite escape to Peppers on the Point Lake Rotorua - a historic retreat nestled in an idyllic spot at the edge of the striking lake on New Zealand's North Island. Set in a former 1930s mansion, this charming property is one of the finest lodges in the area, retaining its distinct charm with award-winning cuisine, spectacular views and quintessential Peppers service in one of New Zealand's most beautiful spots.

Hidden less than a three-hour drive from Auckland, within a geothermal wonderland, this heritage escape wants you to truly immerse yourself in the natural splendour of the region: plunge into bubbling mud baths, perennially warm waters and unparalleled natural beauty. Discover the charms of this enchanting corner of the world with this romantic lodge escape, where adventure is literally at your doorstep.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Wake up to daily à la carte breakfast served in The Mains Restaurant
- Savour a decadent three-course dinner for two showcasing seasonal delicacies and local produce
- Toast your escape with a beer, glass of wine or soft drink per adult on arrival
- Enjoy a box of New Zealand handmade chocolates waiting for you in your suite on arrival

**This deal has NO peak surcharges:** Travel any time for the same great price.

Constructed in the 1930s as a private mansion, this charming property is one of the finest lodges in the area, pairing its distinct heritage charm with award-winning cuisine, spectacular views and quintessential Peppers service in one of New Zealand's most beautiful landscapes.

Less than a three-hour drive from Auckland, within a geothermal wonderland, this heritage property ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, allows you to truly immerse yourself in the natural splendour of the region. title: Rotorua Five-Star Pullman Lake-View Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
The natural beauty of Rotorua is yours to explore from a five-star launchpad: Pullman Rotorua, a luxurious haven boasting one of the best locations in town. Perfectly poised steps from Lake Rotorua and the town’s boutique shops, trendy restaurants and vibrant entertainment, this sumptuous oasis is the ideal base. Discover the biggest geyser in the Southern Hemisphere, bubbling mud, hot springs and so much more.

The first international five-star hotel in the city, Pullman Rotorua offers guests an exceptional experience through its modern lake-view rooms, state-of-the-art amenities and world-renowned service. From delicious cocktails at the lavish bar to expert chefs preparing signature dishes at Barrel & Co. Bar and Grill, the hotel will ensure you never forget you're staying at a Pullman.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Start each day with breakfast at Barrel & Co. Bar and Grill
- Celebrate your escape with a welcome drink each on arrival
- Let yourself indulge with 50% dining discount at Barrel & Co. Bar and Grill throughout your stay
- Sleep in on your final day with a guaranteed 1pm late checkout

title: Rotorua Five-Star Lakefront Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Complimentary Minibar
description:
Breathtaking views and pure relaxation await at the five-star Black Swan Lakeside Boutique Hotel, located on the shores of Lake Rotorua, just 10 minutes from the city. Counting only eight luxurious rooms, set in over an acre of perfectly manicured rose gardens and sweeping lawns, the hotel is an oasis of privacy and serenity, fitted with incredible facilities. Take a dip in the solar-heated swimming pool or two hot tubs, relax with a treatment at the superb spa or savour locally inspired fare at the hotel's offsite fine-dining restaurant, which grants some of the most incredible views over the lake.

This boutique haven is perfectly positioned to enjoy both the outdoor pursuits of the lake and the attractions of the city. Witness the natural marvel, Pōhutu Geyser - the biggest active geyser in the Southern Hemisphere - delve deeper into Māori history at Te Puia museum or retreat to your inviting room and relax by your personal fireplace.
offer_address: 171 Kawaha Point Rd, Kawaha Point, Rotorua 3010, New Zealand

title: Peaceful Lake Rotorua Lodge Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Get a taste for life by the water with a relaxing, romantic escape to Koura Lodge - a boutique bed and breakfast on the edge of Lake Rotorua. With only eight rooms - all with 180-degree lake views - an outdoor hot tub and kayaks available for guests, this intimate lodge transports you to the heart of a natural wonderland, yet it’s just a five-minute drive from the town centre.

Unwind in the peaceful surrounds or ignite your sense of curiosity and explore this idyllic destination. Rotorua is a place where fascinating Māori culture, geothermal activity, adrenaline-fuelled adventure and wellness come together to create an experience to remember.
offer_address: 209 Kawaha Point Road, Kawaha Point, Rotorua 3010, New Zealand

title: Sophisticated Rotorua Lakeside Retreat with Onsite Dining & Geothermal Mineral Pool
description:
Time to check into pure comfort with Lake Rotorua practically in your backyard, where geothermal wonders let the earth breathe and nature paints its masterpieces. Enjoy complimentary access to geothermal pools, bubble away in the hotel's hot tub, grab a drink on the lakeview terrace at Clarke's Bar and tuck into some tasty bites at Atlas Restaurant.

At the Novotel Rotorua Lakeside, you'll find yourself at the centre of the excitement, mere steps away from the lively Eat Street with everything from steaks to ice cream. Sail down the luge at Skyline Rotorua, experience the rush of jet boating on the lake, or learn more about Māori culture and New Zealand's geothermal landscape at Te Puia.
offer_address: Lake End, Tutanekai Street, Rotorua 3010, New Zealand

title: Sophisticated Pullman City Break near Lake Rotorua with Onsite Brasserie & Day Spa
description:
Uncover the beauty of New Zealand's geothermal wonderland with a stay at this stylish urban sanctuary cradled in the heart of Rotorua. Be it leisure or adventure, this luxurious hotel is stamped with trademark Pullman hospitality and superbly situated for easy access to the city's top attractions, including Lake Rotorua and the Government Gardens.

Spend your days exploring the nearby shooting geysers, bubbling mud, natural hot springs, lush forests and Maori cultural centres, or enjoy the vibrant atmosphere at Eat Streat. Back at your hotel, you can relax in your plush room and indulge in farm-to-table delights at Barrel & Co. Bar and Grill, while sipping on refreshing drinks.
